remarks: A mapping from the nonnegative integers is finitely supported under certain conditions.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 23-Dec-2019.)
statement:
mptnn0fsupp.0 $e |- ( ph -> .0. e. V ) $.
mptnn0fsupp.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN0 ) -> C e. B ) $.
mptnn0fsuppd.d $e |- ( k = x -> C = D ) $.
mptnn0fsuppd.s $e |- ( ph -> E. s e. NN0 A. x e. NN0 ( s < x -> D = .0. ) ) $.
mptnn0fsuppd $p |- ( ph -> ( k e. NN0 |-> C ) finSupp .0. ) $.
$d .0. s x $.
$d B k $.
$d C s x $.
$d D k $.
$d k ph s x $.
